title: Manage an Emergency Response Drill (Fire)
description: The port is conducting a full-scale fire drill at a warehouse. The emergency manager must coordinate the response.

tasks.description: Activate the port's emergency alert system with a 'DRILL' message.
tasks.expected_outcome: The alert system is activated, notifying all port personnel of the drill.

tasks.description: Coordinate the response of the port's internal fire brigade and the local city fire department.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager communicates with both teams, directing them to the scene as per the plan.

tasks.description: Log all actions and communications during the drill and conduct a debrief afterwards to assess performance.
tasks.expected_outcome: A complete log of the drill is created, and a debriefing meeting is scheduled.
